title: Kha'Zix Visual Bug - Before the Claws are Evolved Only
body: I would like to report a visual bug; which has been present on Live for over a year. If you look at the picture, it's very obvious. It's LONG OVERDUE for a fix - just making sure it has some attention since clearly nobody else seems to be noticing it.

replies.body: Quick update here - we figured out the issue and are looking to have this resolved for next patch.

WOW! Thank you so much for the amazingly fast work, I actually came on today to ask how the investigation on this was going, but for there to already be a progress report is more than I could have hoped for! ;) 
Just to clarify, you're suggesting a fix will be up on live servers on 5.20?
No worries at all! Yup, it's looking like this will be fixed in patch 5.20. :]

Hey Zol,

Thanks for the report, we'll take a look!
oh man, that visual bug happened to me everytime so i always thought it was normal, thank you for pointing it out!

> oh man, that visual bug happened to me everytime so i always thought it was normal, thank you for pointing it out!

Thanks for commenting, I appreciate any attention drawn to this issue. 
I actually evolve my Q first, every single game when I play Kha'Zix; primarily because the evolved claws are not bugged. You could say that this visual bug therefore affects my gameplay. I would never evolve wings first because I don't want to put up with this visual atrocity for a second longer than level 6.
